text: Device for Connection of Luminaires (DCL) is a European standard for ceiling light fixtures introduced in 2005 and refined in 2009. It uses 6 ampere. DCL must carry the CE marking as per the Low Voltage Directive. DCL is only allowed to be installed with ground. Example of DCL socket. {| class="wikitable" |+ Socket internals |- ! Pin !! Color !!
